name: Consistency Champion
description: This badge is awarded to people who have had a streak longer than 10 days.

name: Fitness Influencer
description: This trophy is awarded to people who have published 10 workout plans

name: Strongman
description: Achieve a top 10% lift in any of the 3 main lifts, bench press, deadlift, or squat.

name: Lifetime Supporter
description: This badge is awarded to those who have been an active member for over 5 years.

name: Gym sage
description: This badge is awarded to those who have made a workout plan that has been liked by over 100 users.

name: Popular Personality
description: This badge is awarded to those who have 100+ friends.
